member.name: T:Futureware.MantisConnect.Attachment
member.summary: A class that manages the information about an attachment. The class does not manage the attachment itself.

member.name: F:Futureware.MantisConnect.Attachment.id
member.summary: The attachment id.

member.name: F:Futureware.MantisConnect.Attachment.fileName
member.summary: The attachment file name.

member.name: F:Futureware.MantisConnect.Attachment.size
member.summary: The attachment size in bytes.

member.name: F:Futureware.MantisConnect.Attachment.contentType
member.summary: The attachment mime type.

member.name: F:Futureware.MantisConnect.Attachment.dateSubmitted
member.summary: The timestamp the attachment was submitted.

member.name: F:Futureware.MantisConnect.Attachment.downloadUrl
member.summary: The download url.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Attachment.#ctor(Futureware.MantisConnect.MantisConnectWebservice.AttachmentData)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: The webservice type that captures attachment information.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Attachment.ConvertArray(Futureware.MantisConnect.MantisConnectWebservice.AttachmentData[])
member.summary: A static method that converts an array of attachments from the webservice type to this instances of this class.
member.param: An array of attachments in webservice data type

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Attachment.Id
member.summary: Gets the attachment id, must be greater than or equal to 1.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Attachment.FileName
member.summary: Gets the filename of the attachment.
member.remarks: This is the original name of the file that was uploaded by the user. It is not the name of the attachment file on the server.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Attachment.Size
member.summary: Gets the file size in bytes.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Attachment.ContentType
member.summary: Gets the MIME content type.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Attachment.DateSubmitted
member.summary: Gets the date where the attachment was uploaded to Mantis.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Attachment.DownloadUrl
member.summary: Gets the URL from which the attachment can be downloaded.
member.remarks: At the moment downloading of attachments via MantisConnect is not supported. This URL can be used to download attachments if the user is logged into Mantis, and has the appropriate access rights. The user will have to do the download via the web browser.

member.name: T:Futureware.MantisConnect.Config
member.summary: Provides access to Mantis configuration.
member.remarks:
This is useful to provide access to Mantis configuration like enumerations and any other configs that are not considered private. Using this class the client will not be able to retrieve sensitive information from the webservice, like passwords, database names, host names, ...etc.
This class also provides the necessary caching to avoid unnecessary round trips to the server. Caching is feasible in this class due to the static nature of these configs.

member.name: F:Futureware.MantisConnect.Config.session
member.summary: The session to use in getting configs.

member.name: F:Futureware.MantisConnect.Config.configs
member.summary: Hashtable of cached configuration options.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Config.#ctor(Futureware.MantisConnect.Session)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: Session to be used to retrieve the configs.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Config.Session
member.summary: Returns a reference to the instance used to access MantisConnect webservice.

member.summary: Access Level Enumeration

member.summary: Severity Enumeration

member.summary: Reproducibility Enumeration

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Config.Get(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Gets the value associated with a configuration variable of type string.
member.param: The name of the configuration variable to get.
The output parameter to store the config variable in. This is a parameter rather than a return value to allow overloading of this method for different types.

member.summary: Get the enumeration with the specified name.
member.remarks: See also the properties for the enumerations.
member.param: An output parameter to contain the created instance.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Config.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Get the enumeration with the specified name.
member.remarks: See also the properties for the enumerations.

member.name: T:Futureware.MantisConnect.MantisEnum
member.summary: A class to handle enumerations that are defined in Mantis.
member.remarks: The format of Mantis enumerations is as follows: "10:viewer,25:reporter,40:updater,55:developer,70:manager,90:administrator"

member.name: F:Futureware.MantisConnect.MantisEnum.enumeration
member.summary: The enumeration string supplied at construction time.

member.summary: A dictionary that maps labels to their corresponding code.

member.summary: A dictionary that maps codes to their corresponding labels.

member.summary: Constructor

member.summary: Given an id, this indexer returns the corresponding enumeration name.

member.summary: Given a name, this indexer returns the corresponding enumeration id.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.MantisEnum.Count
member.summary: The number of values in the enumeration.

member.summary: Returns a collection containing the labels in the enumeration.

member.summary: Returns a collection containing the codes in the enumeration.

member.summary: Converts the enum to a string in MantisBT format.

member.name: T:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request
member.summary: A wrapper around to provide a more friendly interface for the rest of the C# code.
member.remarks: Some methods will do do pre or post processing of data to convert them from the webservice format to one that is easier to access. For example, the webservice may return information about project ids/names as a serialised string, which then gets deserialised by this wrapper into a for easier access and binding to standard controls.

member.name: F:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.session
member.summary: Session to retrieve the user name / password of the current session from.

member.name: F:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.mc
member.summary: Webservice auto-generated proxy.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.#ctor(Futureware.MantisConnect.Session)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: The session to use for all communication with the webservice. The user name and password are used from their to provide such details to the webservice with each call without exposing such detail to the user of the library.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueAdd(Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue)
member.summary: Add the specified issue to Mantis database.
member.param: The issue details. Issue id is ignored.
member.remarks: TODO: Consider a generic and easy way to time operations.
member.returns: The id of the added issue

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueUpdate(Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue)
member.summary: Update an issue

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueCheckin(System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a check-in comment and possibly resolves an issue.
member.param: The id of the issue to add the comment to.
true: check-in fixed the issue, false: check-in is a partial fix.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueDelete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete the issue with the specified id

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueGet(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get information related to the specified issue id.
member.param: The id of the issue to retrieve information for.
member.returns: The issue details, this does not include related information in other tables, like issue notes, ...etc.
member.exception: The issue id is 0 or negative.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueGetAll(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all issues that are visible to the current user independent of the current project.
member.param: The number of issues per page.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueExists(System.Int32)
member.summary: Check if there exists an issue with the specified id.
member.param: Id of issue to check for.
member.returns: true: exists, false: does not exist
member.exception: The issue id is 0 or negative.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueGetIdFromSummary(System.String)
member.summary: Search for an issue with the specified summary and return its issue id.
member.remarks: This is useful to allow a software which is automatically reporting issues due to exceptions or whatever reason to check first that the issue was not reported before. And if it was, then it knows the issue id and hence is able to add a note or do whatever with this id. Other applications may decide to delete the issue and create a new one, basically it is up to the client application to decide how to use the returned issue id.
member.exception: Summary field is empty or too long.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueGetLastId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the id of the last "reported" issue that is accessible to the logged in user.
member.remarks: This is useful for applications that need to know when new issues are being submitted to refresh a certain view or do something with such knowledge.
member.param: -1: default, 0: all projects, otherwise: project id
member.returns: 0: no issues accessible to logged in user, otherwise Id of the last reported issue.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.UserGetAccessibleProjects
member.summary: Get projects accessible to the currently logged in user.
member.remarks: This returns a table ("Projects") which includes two columns ("project_id", "name").

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.UserGetFilters(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the filters that are available to the current user and the specified project.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.GetIssues(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the issues based on the specified filter, page, and number per page.
member.param: The project id to apply the filter ON, or 0 for ALL projects.
Page number to get the issues for.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.ProjectAdd(Futureware.MantisConnect.Project)
member.summary: Adds a project to the Mantis database.
member.param: The project data, the project id is not required.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.ProjectDelete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a project given it's id.

member.summary: Adds a project version and sets the id on the supplied project version instance.
member.returns: The version id of the added project version.

member.summary: Updates the project version data.
member.param: The project version with the approriate id.
member.exception: Version id or project id is invalid.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.ProjectVersionDelete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a project version given it's id.
member.exception: The project version id is invalid.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.ProjectGetCategories(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get categories defined for the project with the specified id.

member.summary: Get unreleased versions defined for the project with the specified id.

member.summary: Gets the issues that are visible to the logged in user and belong to the project with the specified id.
member.param: The number of issues per page.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.ConfigGet(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Get string value of the specified configuration option.
member.remarks:
If the caller attempts to retrieve sensitive configuration options like passwords, database name, ...etc, an exception will be raised.
TODO: Overload this method to get more types of configurations.
member.param: Name of configuration option (without the $g_ part)
An output parameter to hold the value of the configuration option
member.exception: config parameter is empty or blank.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueNoteAdd(System.Int32,Futureware.MantisConnect.IssueNote)
member.summary: Adds a note to the specified issue.
member.param: Issue id to add note to.
member.remarks: The user must have write access to the issue and the issue must not be readonly.
member.exception: The issue id is 0 or negative. Or note is empty or blank.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueNoteDelete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete the issue note with the specified id
member.param: Id of issue note to delete
member.exception: The issue note id is 0 or negative.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueAttachmentAdd(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Adds an attachment to an issue.
member.param: The id of the issue to associate the attachment with.
The file name of the attachment. Only the file name dot extension.
A byte array that contains a base 64 encoding of the attachment.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueAttachmentAdd(System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Uploads the specified file to the specified issue.
member.param: The file path of the file to attach.
The name of the file (without any path) to be associated with the uploaded file (if null, will extract name from full path).

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueAttachmentDelete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes an attachment given it's id.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueAttachmentGet(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets an attachment given it's id.
member.param: The attachment id. This is returned when attachment is added or when attachments list is returned with the issue details.

member.name: T:Futureware.MantisConnect.StringUtils
member.summary: A class that includes a set of string utility methods.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.StringUtils.WebserviceMultilineToNative(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a multiline string from webservice format to native format that is used by the local OS and its controls.
member.remarks: This is to be called on fields that support multiline string after reading them from the webservice and before setting them in controls like textboxes.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.StringUtils.NativeMultilineToWebservice(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a multiline string from native format to webservice format.
member.remarks: This is to be called on fields that support multiline strings before sending them to the webservice.
